hero.title: BARRIO
hero.subtitle: COFFEE & COMMUNITY
hero.description: Discover our artisan-roasted coffee, crafted with care and delivered to your door. At Barrio, we're more than a coffee roastery—we're a neighborhood.

footer.newsletterDescription: Get the latest updates on new products and upcoming sales

default.description: Kira was born as a joyful sparkling fragrance, capturing the very essence of sunshine and laughter in every delicate spritz. Like a playful breeze on a warm day, our scents effortlessly invigorate the spirit, infusing the air with a sense of lightness and elegance. Our scents invigorate the spirit and celebrate life's vibrant moments.

a.description: Each bottle is a portal to a realm where happiness is not just a fleeting emotion, but a scent that clings to you like a whispered dream, an invisible symphony you carry with you through every step, every breath.

i.description: Each of Kira's fragrances invites you to imagine life's most vibrant moments—spontaneous bursts of joy that remind us to embrace the present.

k.description: Kira's products are cruelty free, neither the completed product nor its ingredients have ever been tested on animals.

r.description: Kira is a shimmering burst of light, an alchemy of sunshine and laughter, woven into each delicate spritz—an ethereal dance of joy that lingers like a memory of the sun's warm embrace.
